QuestData.Title: Return to Jaina
QuestData.Description: We must make plans to destroy the remnants of the Defias. Please convey my thanks to Lady Jaina, back in Theramore. She has ever been a loyal friend and steadfast ally.$B$BGo to the Mage Quarter at the western end of the city and speak with Archmage Malin at the foot of the tower there. He will speed your return to Theramore.
QuestData.LogDescription: Return to Lady Jaina Proudmoore in Theramore.
QuestData.RewardText: I have no doubt that the king meant every word when he told you he plans to destroy the Defias once and for all. He does not make promises lightly, and the enemies of Stormwind should know it.
